name: Replace CSV with MD Table
description:
This script replaces a selected CSV block in your note with corresponding Markdown.
After selecting the CSV text and activating the custom menu action a dialog requesting the delimiter character appears.
User can select ',' (comma), ';' (semicolon), 'TAB' (tabulation character) or 'Other'.
If 'Other' is selected on this dialog, another dialog appears asking to input a custom string.
After the delimiter selection another dialog pops up asking if the first row contains headers or if the table starts directly with data.
## Limitations of version 0.1
- User input is not sanitized in the custom delimiter dialog, so use it properly and at your own risk.
- Quoting is ignored, so if you have your data surrounded by quotes it will show as it is.
